name: Device Metadata
description:
Most device metadata is automatically collected by the Conviva SDK; however, some platform SDKs do not have the capability to collect these values and must explicitly pass them. Please refer to the Stream Sensor Integration documentation for your particular platform SDK.

https://pulse.conviva.com/learning-center/content/sensor_developer_center/conviva_sensor_developer_center.htm?tocpath=Stream%20Sensor%20Integration%7CPlatform%20Integrations%7C_____0
